metadata.title: CVE-2022-24836 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Nokogiri is an open source XML and HTML library for Ruby. Nokogiri `<v1.13.4` contains an inefficient regular expression that is susceptible toexcessive backtracking when attempting to detect encoding in HTMLdocuments. Users are advised to upgrade to Nokogiri `>= 1.13.4`. There areno known workarounds for this issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24836` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-nokogiri - 1.13.7+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-nokogiri package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.7+dfsg-2').
